title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from a table are displayed in different formats in a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
EB: When inputting new Date() as content for three items and saving and previewing, the expected result is that all three items should show the same format. However, the actual result is that the data item and text item display the same format, while the dynamic text item displays a different format.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Insert a text item, a data item, and a dynamic text item. 2. Save the changes. 3. Preview the page.
